EmailTemplate.subject: Case #{!Case.CaseNumber} - HR Address Change Template
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Global Business Services. Address Changes can be made by visiting Stir – My Beam Suntory – My Career and Benefits. On the right hand side of that page, you will find the address change form under the heading My Info. Please ensure you are using Internet Explorer as your browser and using the VPN if accessing remotely. File feeds update Payroll and Benefit Vendors weekly.
Thank You, The GBS HR Team
